metadata.name: One Hundred Years
metadata.description:
A generative animation by Unruly Unroll, 2022.  
Custom HTML, JavaScript and GLSL code.

[View Fullscreen](https://arweave.net/C6t4JeRgT12rGWpFR_JF6lbySqPbjKU1FozVREHEk0M)

The canvas is responsive, its content will adapt to the size and orientation of the browser window.  
The rendering is generative and will be slightly different each time the page is loaded.

How to interact on desktop ?

Press the 'SPACE' key to pause/unpause the animation.  
Press the 'S' key to save the current frame to a PNG file.  
Press the 'F' key or double-click to switch to full screen mode.  
Press the 'ESC' key to exit full screen mode.

How to interact on mobile ?

Tap the screen to pause/unpause the animation.  
Double-tap the screen to switch to full screen mode.  
Tap the back button to exit full screen mode.

@UnrulyUnroll
